LanguageData.Transgender_Adored.label: Adored
LanguageData.Transgender_Adored.description: Cherishing transgender people leads to a more diverse and accepting population.
LanguageData.Transgender_Despised.label: Despised
LanguageData.Transgender_Despised.description: Valuing traditional norms, transgender individuals are contrary to our community's foundational principles.
